alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Van Buren and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maharishi Vedic City, or near Fairfield, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Maharishi Vedic City around 325 PM CDT. Fairfield and Libertyville around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Birmingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
